newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Petroz says lifts Surat field reserves.
newsitem.headline: Petroz says lifts Surat field reserves.

text.p: Oil and gas junior Petroz NL said on Wednesday it had increased reserves for the Silver Springs/Renlim fields in the Surat Basin following a pilot dewatering project.
Proven and probable reserves of sales gas had increased by 16 petajoules, condensate by 500,000 standard barrels and liquid petroleum gas by 75,000 tonnes, Petroz said.
This approximately doubled proven and probable reserves.
Petroz has 50 percent of the Silver Springs/Renlim fields, while operator Santos Ltd has the remaining 50 percent.
